segments.text: You stay beside me ; I'll fry the meat in the oil first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Daddy , what seasonings are you going to cook the meat with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Er , I am gonna go with salt and sauce !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I remember Mom going with a lot of pepper for the meat .
segments.speaker: S2
